title: Use Conservation of Momentum
text: The conservation of momentum suggests that $$p_{before}=p_{after}$$. Here, $$p_{before}=0$$, and $$p_{after}=m_{shell} v_{shell,horizontall}$$ + $$m_{cannon} v_{cannon}$$. Find $$v_{cannon}$$.

title: Use Conservation of Momentum to Solve For $$v_{cannon}$$
